Name: Serpent Stone VI
Desc:
Wielding the power of the Water Dragon generates Clues to Power, which can be consumed to unleash an even stronger power of the Water Dragon.
Enhances Assault into Serpent Assault VI and Serpent Assault Enrage VI.
Also, increases Sea Serpent Enrage VI Damage.
Auto Use Mode On/Off: Right-click
Required skill: Serpent Assault Enrage Lv. 20 or higher

HFields.h1:
Consume 5 Serpent Stones to activate Assault skills for 15 sec.
Serpent Stones +1 each time you use a Water Dragon skill. Up to 5 Serpent Stones can be carried.
Serpent Assault VI
MP Cost: 60. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 705% Damage 6 times.
Serpent Assault Enrage VI
MP Cost: 60. Summons a Water Dragon for 5 sec.
The Water Dragon periodically attacks up to 6 enemies at 905% Damage 6 times. Disappears if attacking a single enemy 10 times.
[Passive Effects: Sea Serpent Enrage VI Damage +438%p]
